trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule"></xref> class represents a specific type of access rule that is used to allow or deny an Active Directory Domain Services object the right to create child objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference and access control type.
If you use this constructor, it creates a create child access rule that applies to all child types.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, and Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance information.
If you use this constructor, it creates a create child access rule that applies to all child types.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, and child object type.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
The schema GUID of the type of child objects that can or cannot be created.
If this is <xref href="System.Guid.Empty"></xref>, then the access rule applies to all child types.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance information, and inherited object type.
If you use this constructor, it creates a create child access rule that applies to all child types.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
The schema GUID of the child object type that can inherit this access rule.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, child object type, and Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance information.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
The schema GUID of the type of child objects that can or cannot be created.
If this is <xref href="System.Guid.Empty"></xref>, then the access rule applies to all child types.
One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule"></xref> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, child object type, Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance information, and inherited object type.
An <xref href="System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference"></xref> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
One of the <xref href="System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
The schema GUID of the type of child objects that can or cannot be created.
If this is <xref href="System.Guid.Empty"></xref>, then the access rule applies to all child types.
One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance"></xref> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
The schema GUID of the child object type that can inherit this access rule.
